body_html:
I did, but that's not a good solution, is it?
It should in no case be required to manually edit a whole bunch of stuff here and there. This should work out of the box. Seems like the TensorFlow build scripts could need some improvements, to respect a user's PATH and LD_LIBRARY_PATH settings.

body:
I did, but that's not a good solution, is it?
It should in no case be required to manually edit a whole bunch of stuff here and there. This should work out of the box. Seems like the TensorFlow build scripts could need some improvements, to respect a user's PATH and LD_LIBRARY_PATH settings.
